content.text:
# President of the Assembly of Yugoslavia

|first          = Ivan Ribar
|last           =
|abolished      =
|succession     =
|salary         =
}}
The President of the Assembly of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia was the presiding officer of the Yugoslavian legislature.
